name: Pyramid
overview: Pyramid is an action arcade game. The aim is to find all of the pieces of an ancient scroll hiding the secrets of pyramids construction. The parts of the scroll are located in the Cheops Pyramid. The game protagonist is Seti from Nubia planet. His only skill is the ability to jump. Contact with the encountered creatures or flames means a loss of energy. To gain access to certain parts of the pyramid the player must look for the keys.
